thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: Robert%20

author: Robert%20
title: Robert%20
text: I was browsing for a place to stay and found a place quickly through Flatmates.Com, contacted and set up meeting quickly, and having my flatmate check my background through Facebook and other social networks is handy to, giving them peace of mind, being in the same age group is obviously an advantage too, this website is set out well for non tech savvy people like myself.
